max_power_sell.name: Max power sell
max_power_sell.description: Maximum power the grid can provide to other assets for one time-step [kW]

max_power_buy.name: Max power buy
max_power_buy.description: Maximum power the grid can receive from other assets for one time-step [kW]

CO2_emissions.name: Co2 emissions
CO2_emissions.description: C02 emissions produced by kWh used [gCO2/kWh]

monthly_peak_cost.name: Monthly peak cost
monthly_peak_cost.description: cost for max monthly peak power [€/kW]

sell_to_grid.name: Sell to grid
sell_to_grid.description: Price at which you sell electricity to the public grid [€]

buy_from_grid.name: Buy from grid
buy_from_grid.description: Price at which you buy electricity from the grid [€]

soc.name: Soc
soc.description: Current state of charge  of the battery [%]

max_charge.name: Max charge
max_charge.description: Maximum C-rate permitted in charging mode [1/h] (kW/kWh)

max_discharge_cp.name: Max discharge cp
max_discharge_cp.description: Maximum discharge power of the charger [kW]

tilt.name: Tilt
tilt.description: The tilt of the solar pv [°]

azimuth.name: Azimuth
azimuth.description: The azimuth of the solar pv [°]

tracking.name: Tracking
tracking.description: Is the solar pv a single axis tracking system? [-]

module.name: Module
module.description: what kind of module is the solar panel. The DOF contains 6 standard modules, which can be found in data folder. One of the modules should be taken. Other modules can be added to the datafile [-]

temp_parameters.name: Temp parameters
temp_parameters.description: How is the solar pv mounted? Options are: 'insulated' or 'free_standing' [-]

installed_capacity_kWp.name: Installed capacity kwp
installed_capacity_kWp.description: The max energy output under full solar radiation [kWp]

v_cin.name: V cin
v_cin.description: Cut-in speed, minimum wind speed from which the turbine starts to produce energy [m/s]

v_cout.name: V cout
v_cout.description: Cut-out speed, maximum wind speed supported by the wind turbine, above this speed the turbine stops to produce energy. [m/s]

v_rated.name: V rated
v_rated.description: Rated speed, from this speed and above, the turbine produces its nominal power [m/s]

p_rated.name: P rated
p_rated.description: nominal power produced by the turbine when the wind speed is between the rated speed and the cut-out speed [kW]

money_per_kWh.name: Money per kwh
money_per_kWh.description: Financial compensation perceived per kWh produced, for example green certificates [€/kWh]
